title: Lee to introduce bill to block Biden from minting trillion-dollar platinum coin
description: Sen. Mike Lee (R-UT) will introduce legislation this week to prevent the Treasury from minting a $1 trillion platinum coin, a controversial workaround to raising the debt limit.

title: SPN: More than 40% of voters say country is severely divided
description: (The Center Square) – More than four out of every 10 voters now feels as if the country is severely divided, with a combined 20% of individuals admitting that they have stopped talking with a family member or friend because of politics, according to a new State Policy Network poll.
